column6: Data analysis and development of statistical models.

detalles: Implemented a new method to obtain prior distributions.
Added new families of generalized linear models.
Several internal changes to improve the performance and readability of the code.
Development of Shiny apps to conduct data analysis and automate tasks.
Time series forecasting and task automation.

compania: Instituto Nacional de Estadística y Censos
column6: I worked on the estimation in the presence of non-response and conducted simulation studies to evaluate imputation methods.

detalles: Tutored Statistics and \proglang{R} and programming in English to undergraduate students.
Tutored Statistics to high-school and undergraduate students.
